mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatting_info (croom_idx, chatter, chat_content, chat_emoticon, chat_file, created_at) VALUES (#{croom_idx}, #{chatter}, #{chat_content}, #{chat_emoticon}, #{chat_file}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chatting_info WHERE croom_idx = #{croom_idx} ORDER BY created_at ASC;
